page.title: 19FISHING INNERLEITHEN
page.content: Fishermen come from far afield to fish the Tweed famous for its{Salmon}and {Trout.}Also caught are{Grayling}and {Eels}Permits can be obtained in Season There are no great distances to walk from the nearest roads to the riverbank and the scenery is beautiful Local fishermen wear waders.They wear Barber coats which are first cleaned then waterproofed by scrubbing with wax.{ Andrew Dickison}a Champion Fly Caster of the Borders has made a video film giving step by step instructions on casting a Trout and a Salmon Fly rod,showing different techniques and highlighting the faults.Fishermen can stay in comfortable hotels and guest houses in Innerleithen.No one need be afraid of overbalancing in deep water while wearing waders.Do not panic. Tread water with arms outstretched and using Breast Stroke swim to safety.
